events.text: Monika from ITC calls a customer, Ramal, as per his request to address his grievances that have not been resolved yet
Ramal was on vacation and couldn't be reached by their employees, so his complaints accumulated.
Monika transfers him to different departments during the call, but none of the issues get resolved
The call ends without any resolution and Monika promises to look into the issue despite knowing that it will not make any difference
Throughout the call, the customer is very frustrated and complains about the lack of help from the company
